definition: Great Wall Hotel (Beijing Sheraton 喜來登|喜来登)

sentences.english: You can find the information around this hotel from the information card in your room.
sentences.chinese: 有關本飯店的所有信息都在房間的信息卡上。

sentences.english: The restaurant receives hundreds of customers every day.
sentences.chinese: 這家飯店每天接待數以百計的顧客。

sentences.english: The Rooks Holiday Hotel, Mae Hong Son is set in the midst of a fascinating valley in Northern Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 茹克思假日飯店坐落在泰國北部一處迷人的山谷之中。

sentences.english: You could stay in Hilton Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 你可以住在希爾頓飯店。

sentences.english: Riverside Hotel at Sea Island in the southern part of Davao, from the international airport two kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 海島水邊飯店位於達沃的南部，離國際機場2公里。

sentences.english: While meeting financial group influence in foreign hotel to press on to the border, is because"wolf" come.
sentences.chinese: 在遇到外來飯店財團勢力壓境時，是因爲“狼”來了。

sentences.english: The old man provided an idea for his son on how to run a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 這位老人就如何經營飯店給他的兒子支招兒。

sentences.english: There’re quite a few shops and galleries near your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在你住的飯店附近有幾家商店和藝術館。

sentences.english: There is a very good restaurant in the Kunlun Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在崑崙飯店有一家好餐館。

sentences.english: I'll shoot the works this time by giving you a treat in a five-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 這次我也豁出去了，到五星級大飯店請你們喫一頓。

sentences.english: Neither the Concorde nor the Napoléon has a swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 協和和拿破崙飯店都沒有游泳池。

sentences.english: This is the third time the tourists squawked about the service of the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 這是旅客們第三次對飯店的服務發牢騷了。

sentences.english: He inherited Flor on first coming to the St. Gregory.
sentences.chinese: 他一到聖格雷戈裏飯店就留用了弗洛拉。

sentences.english: This is steamed chick. a specialty of this restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 這是清蒸仔雞，這家飯店的特色菜。

sentences.english: A:I am at the Ambassador Hotel right now.
sentences.chinese: 我現在住在國賓大飯店。

sentences.english: Fancy hotels are beginning to accommodate both man and pets.
sentences.chinese: 一些別出心裁的飯店已經開始同時留宿人和寵物。
